scale_to_zero.description: Time to scale to zero (in seconds)

display_name.description: User-friendly name of the endpoint (e.g. Stable Diffusion 2.1)

registry_credential.description: The key of a registry credential used to authenticate to a private registry

health_check_path.description: URL path of a health check endpoint

env_overrides.description: JSON object with environment variable overrides

container_secrets.description: A list of container secrets to inject as environment variables

display_name.description: User-friendly name of the endpoint (e.g. Stable Diffusion 2.1)

health_check_path.description: URL path of a health check endpoint

auto_volume_experimental.description: EXPERIMENTAL: autogenerate a volume for the endpoint

volumes_experimental.description: EXPERIMENTAL: volumes to be used by this container

env.description: Env is a list of environment variables to be used in a container

token.description: Opaque token for accessing the volume using OctoAI tooling (e.g. CLI)

key.description: The lookup key for this credential
The lookup key for this credntial

p99_millis.description: the quantile for p99 response times in milliseconds

p95_millis.description: the quantile for p95 response times in milliseconds

p50_millis.description: the quantile for p50 response times in milliseconds

timestamp.description: time of the log entry (ISO8601 format)

replica_id.description: optional replica id associated with the event

instance_type.description: type of instance this event occurred on

timestamp.description: time of the log entry (ISO8601 format)

age.description: number of seconds this replica has been ready. set to -1 if replica is not ready

is_live.description: If this endpoint should be considered live or not

instance_name.description: String to specify when creating/updating an endpoint

display_name.description: User-friendly name of the instance type

vcpu.description: Number of vCPUs available on the instance type

ram.description: Amount of memory in GB available on the instance type

vram.description: Amount of video memory in GB available on the instance type

accelerator.description: Type of accelerator attached to this instance type

available.description: If the hardware target is available right now

price.description: Price per second in dollars (e.g. 0.0001 for 1/100th of a cent) to use this instance type
